en.lang_this_page_describes_how_you_can_add: This page describes how you can add new medicine or edit or delete medicine.
en.lang_using_the_top_right_corner_add_butt: Using the top right corner add button you can add new medicine.
en.lang_2._you_select_this_med_generic_name: 2. you select this med generic name, category (physical appearance) of this med.
en.lang_3._unit_describe_this_medicine_supp: 3. unit describe this medicine supply either on pieces or box etc.
en.lang_4._you_must_select_a_brand_name_fro: 4. you must select a brand name from where this medicine belongs.
